body_html:
This is certainly an issue -- for those hitting it here are some workarounds until we get some better codecs in TensorFlow:

  • Use tf.summary.audio's max_outputs argument to limit the number of WAVs you're writing to your events file per summary run.
  • If using tf.Supervisor, increase your save_summaries_secs to write summaries less frequently.
body_text:
This is certainly an issue -- for those hitting it here are some workarounds until we get some better codecs in TensorFlow:

Use tf.summary.audio's max_outputs argument to limit the number of WAVs you're writing to your events file per summary run.
If using tf.Supervisor, increase your save_summaries_secs to write summaries less frequently.
body:
This is certainly an issue -- for those hitting it here are some workarounds until we get some better codecs in TensorFlow:

- Use ```tf.summary.audio```'s ```max_outputs``` argument to limit the number of WAVs you're writing to your events file per summary run.
- If using ```tf.Supervisor```, increase your ```save_summaries_secs``` to write summaries less frequently.
